events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Crystal Palace

headlines.description: A moment of brilliance from Anthony Knockaert settled a fiercely contested derby as Brighton beat Crystal Palace 2-1 at Selhurst.

events.name: West Ham United at Cardiff City

headlines.description: Callum Wilson returned after six games out due to injury and opened contributed a goal and an assist as Bournemouth beat Huddersfield 2-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth end losing run to pile more misery on Huddersfield

headlines.description: Jamie Vardy scored his 100th and 101st goals for Leicester City to seal a 3-1 home Premier League win over Fulham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milestone Vardy double gives Leicester 3-1 win over Fulham

headlines.description: Newcastle United produced a remarkable second-half comeback to overturn a two-goal deficit and beat Everton 3-2 for their fifth successive home win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle come from two goals down to beat Everton

headlines.description: Late goals from Yan Valery and James Ward-Prowse saw Southampton come from behind to earn a 2-1 win over Tottenham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs' winless run goes on as Saints seal win

headlines.description: After a goalless opening 45 minutes, Raheem Sterling scored three times in 13 minutes as Manchester City beat Watford 3-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sterling hat-trick gives City 4 point lead at top
